# Lakeshore Loop

## Trail Information

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

d <- read_csv("trail-info.csv")

dd <- d %>% filter(str_detect(`Hike Name`, "Lakeshore"))

dd %>% 
    select(c(1, 5:8)) %>% 
    knitr::kable()
```

```{r}
str_c("Location: :", dd$Location)
str_c("Region: ", dd$Region)
str_c("Distance: ", dd$`Distance (Shorter Option)`)
```

```{r}

dd$Waterfall
dd$`Mountain Biking`
dd$Paddling
dd$`Recommended for Very Young Children`
dd$`Most Highly Recommended`
dd$`Big Adventure`
```
